item.title: 通知大致流程
Android 常用 log
item.description:
## 1. 常用 dump ``` shell adb shell dumpsys activity service com.android.systemui/.SystemUIService > SystemUIService.txt
# nms dump adb shell dumpsys notification --noredact > notification.txt
adb shell dumpsys SurfaceFlinger > SurfaceFlinger.txt
adb shell dumpsys window > window.txt
adb logcat -b events ```
## 2. adb shell settings get
可以用来获取 Android 设备上的**系统设置（配置）**。
